Who: RODIMUS PRIME, Kup, Tuscon Prime
Location: Black Fortress - Cell Block Control Room

The newly recovered took a moment to look around the room as he got a
decidedly luke warm reception from his renewed comrades. His optics
brightened and then dimmed as the news and comments came over the
transmission lines. As grim as the words were, they did not daunt the
figure he cut as he was standing tall once again.

Opening the communication lines he began to speak, "I know that many
of you have no reason to trust me." he said, his voice confident and
yet somehow humble at the same time. "Much time has passed and I have
done a great many things."

Rodimus frowned as his face saddened, but continued talking, "The
unfortunate thing is that I remember each hateful thing as I did as
one of Hydras' lacky. I can only tell you that I am no longer that
person. The power that Hydras had over me is broken, and I will spend
each day and night trying to make it up to each and everyone of you,
and making Hydras pay for everything he has done not only to me but
this planet and you."

"I will see you soon my friends." Rodimus said as he shifted into his
vehicular mode, that grounding of gears echoing through the room.
"First I have to find my wife!"

Rodimus' light flickered to life as brought all his weaponry online,
"You are welcome to accompany me if you like." he called out to Kup
hopefully. "I would be most greatful."

With a rev of his engines Rodimus fired his motor, "NIGHTLIGHT! I AM
COMMING!" Rodimus called out, hoping she would hear him over the noise
and alarms. Hoping against hope that she had her radio Rodimus sent
her a mesage as well, telling her where he was!

(TAG)

Preston
